localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.title:
The combined revenue of the 4 largest US companies hit a record $1.1 trillion over last 12 months...
Apple $AAPL: $325 billion
Microsoft $MSFT: $160 billion
Amazon $AMZN: $419 billion
Google $GOOGL: $197 billion

That's larger than the GDP of all but 14 countries.

Data: @ycharts https://t.co/Ij8yNPYAQF
nodes.author: Charlie Bilello

nodes.excerpt: Ever needed to export a gif that you added to Figma? Now you can! But also, add text, filters and more! Here's how you can with the GIF plugin: Select a frame with a design with GIF(s) a GIF on the canvas and either run the Play GIF or Export GIF commands.
nodes.title: GIF Export - Export GIFs from Figma

nodes.excerpt: BRITEN is the first of its kind all-in-one bundle. Our perfectly paired Advanced Teeth Whitening Kit and Sonic Electric Toothbrush were thoughtfully designed by a dentist to BRITEN your dental hygiene and unlock your most dazzling, white smile.
nodes.title: BRITEN - Effective sonic powered toothbrush for teeth whitening
nodes.author: Erica Halpern

nodes.excerpt: Forma was born of the realisation that all business processes essentially are workflows with a few triggers, conditions, and outcomes. We are a platform that help you create workflows for any of your business processes, and empower your non-technical staff to be able to do it, with a simple, no-code approach.
nodes.title: Forma - No-Code platform to build customised worfklows
nodes.author: Elston Yee

nodes.excerpt: Built on feedback from thousands of ecommerce founders, MatchMe is an AI-powered Marketplace Matching Engine that gives out recommendations based on popularity, traffic, and conversion rates among other factors. Built by the ClearAngel team at Clearco <3
nodes.title: MatchMe by ClearAngel - AI-powered Marketplace Matching Engine
nodes.author: Andrew D'Souza

nodes.excerpt: Do your users take your website for granted? Do want to make using your website living hell? Just add the script and get started! Oh yeah, FYU stands for something ğŸ‘€.
nodes.title: F*ck Your Users - Make using your website a living hell
nodes.author: Piero Maddaleni

nodes.excerpt: It is tiring to save contacts all the time, Whatsapp already has a feature to chat without saving, but it is a hassle to write it. So I created a helper website to solve that problem. The country code will be saved in localStorage.
nodes.title: WhatsApp Helper - A WhatsApp helper to avoid saving number to your contacts
nodes.author: Theodorus Clarence

nodes.excerpt: Load-test.io is your very simple tool to make sure your website will never go down facing huge load traffic. Throw up to 100,000 requests per second ğŸš€ Launch offer is only $19 a month for early adopters !
nodes.title: Load-test.io - Website load testing made easy
nodes.author: Nicolas Mercier

nodes.excerpt: An easy to use integrated solution to allow customers to automate notifications directly in the HubSpot dashboard, to personalize notifications using HubSpot CRM data, and to easily access OneSignalâ€™s analytics and templates from the workflow.
nodes.title: OneSignal HubSpot Integration - Send automated mobile and web push notifications via HubSpot
nodes.author: Hugh Durkin

nodes.excerpt: The power of voice access makes games more accessible and inclusive. Currently you can use Fridai for voice control over supported games and access GPT-3 powered guides and walkthroughs from within the game, so you can immerse yourself in gaming.
nodes.title: Fridai - GPT-3 powered guides & control to make games more accessible
nodes.author: Mark Engelhardt

nodes.title: New covid-19 cases in the US are now down 90% from their peak in January, lowest levels since last June. ğŸ™ https://t.co/Hj0KZZZBju

nodes.excerpt: Code or No Code is a free online quiz that helps you decide which development method to use for your next software project. By asking you a few questions about your idea, we will finally answer the question - to code, or not to code!
nodes.title: Code or No Code - Quiz to reveal the best solution for your software project
nodes.author: Robleh Jama

nodes.excerpt: Quod AI's Chrome extension helps software developers resolve issues smarter. See instant search suggestions for code and more from your Github or Jira issues. Powered by AI.
nodes.title: Quod AI for Github & Jira issues - 1-click search for code & context from Github/Jira issues

nodes.title: Zulip 4.0 - Open source team chat with powerful threading
nodes.author: Tim Abbott

nodes.excerpt: Nototo is a spatial workspace designed to leverage your spatial awareness by allowing you to organize all of your(or your team's) information, on a single canvas. Join our waitlist to become an early user!
nodes.title: Nototo - The spatial workspace - organize everything on one canvas
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

nodes.excerpt: It's 2021 and thousands of people have newly started their remote work journey. Collaborate with 1500+ remote workers, who have done it all before, to know the best practices, tools & guides so you can build a strong career.
nodes.title: Remote Clan - Build a remote career with a community. Not just a job board
nodes.author: Reema Bharti

nodes.excerpt: daily.dev is an all-in-one developer news reader that can help you stay updated on your favorite tech news. Today we are expanding our product suite with a new web app! It's mobile-friendly, fully responsive, and can be installed as a PWA. No signup needed.
nodes.title: daily.dev - All-in-one tech news reader for developers
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Your content is already in Notion. Why not use it for your website? Potion makes this possible with a custom domain, speedy site, custom styles and great SEO.
nodes.title: Potion - Create custom websites in minutes, all on Notion
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: We were tired of sending emails that did nothing for the sender or recipient. So, we invented a way to send one thatâ€™s actually worth reading (and loving). Create, automate, and send customized emails that capture the attention of your subscribers!
nodes.title: rasa.io - Send an email that won't get deleted
nodes.author: Ken Moo

nodes.excerpt: Crely is a Work Management platform with your favorite integrations & automations. No more repetitive manual work - save time and costs. Collaborate effectively using process checklists and templates. Built for remote teams.
nodes.title: Crely No-code Work Automation - No-code Process Management for Business Users
nodes.author: Abhi Onkar

nodes.excerpt: Save your travel finds from anywhere on the internet to your https://mustgo.io map and enjoy it as background right on your https://window.mustgo.io.
nodes.title: mustgo.io - Your travel bookmarks as backgrounds right on your New Tab
nodes.author: Vamsi Rao
